name: Project Oasis
description:
The Project Oasis has a specially designed window feedback, game characters accept the guidance of players while perceiving the actions of players.

Interactive puzzle-solving game with furry element, leading Astell through the oasis research institute full of dessert aroma, to explore the various secrets hidden here?

Break the conventional way of solving linear puzzles, search for clues in your computer, and help Astell finish the puzzle.

Submit answers to puzzles on the computer, or wake up sleeping characters with a message.

You can choose either a relaxed and pleasant mode of exploration or an adventurous mode of pursuit and evasion.

Cross archived character memory makes your journey no longer monotonous.

Characteristic function:

1. Puzzle system not limited to game itself

2. Carefully designed easter-eggs, any action you take may trigger these surprises.
